title: Dasun Shanaka performances and IPL
content: Sri Lanka captain Dasun Shanaka stunned the Indian bowlers for the second consecutive day at the Himachal Pradesh Cricket Association Stadium in Dharamshala on Sunday.Shanaka hit a terrific knock of 74 in just 38 balls to help the visitors put a respectable score of 146 on the board. Earlier after winning the toss and bowling first, the Lankans found themselves struggling at 29 for 4.The visitors had put up a big score of 183 on the board in the second game but it ended in vain and India comfortable chased down the total with 17 balls remaining.
